innovation.title: Use Value
innovation.content: The Endurio protocol enables anyone to promote brand awareness in every Bitcoin transaction using the ENDU token.

innovation.title: Creation Value
innovation.content: Minting ENDU requires an actual Bitcoin transaction fee, along with mining strategy and effort, as all miners must compete for the fixed token minting rate.

innovation.title: Market Value
innovation.content: ENDU has the properties of 'sound money,' as its creation is limited, demand is self-sustaining, and supply decreases through Referral Network rent and Brand Market fees.

innovation.title: Crypto-Secured
innovation.content: Proof of Reference verifies unfalsifiable cryptographic proofs relayed from the Bitcoin network, protecting the protocol from exploits while maintaining full decentralization.

innovation.title: Organic Growth
innovation.content: Endurio is an on-chain branding protocol that promotes its own brand through a built-in referral network, enabling the potential for hyper-growth.

about.heading: People with passion (and a bit of experience).
about.explain: We are a small team of blockchain developers from Vietnam, still working multiple full-time jobs to support our families. This project is a labor of love, built with our own money and effort. We take no venture capital funding whatsoever. If you truly appreciate the project and the community, we welcome your contributions or donations in BTC, ETH, or ENDU. Any support is deeply appreciated.

vision.text-1: The concept of Endurio and an early prototype were developed four years ago. However, at the time, the ecosystem lacked several essential building blocks required for its completion, such as a robust Layer 2 solution with low transaction fees, an AMM-based DEX, and a DApp platform capable of securely storing private keys in the cloud.
vision.text-2: We were limited by the technology of our time.

mission.text-1: Engaging with Vietnam's strongest communities reminded us that our greatest strength is unity. We work better together than apart, which is why we have overcome imperialists and colonizers throughout history, even with a smaller economy and less advanced technology.
mission.text-2: That's why Endurio must grow from Vietnam to the world, not the other way around. Nowhere else is better suited than here, where our people are our greatest strength.
